data.description: Applications of physicochemical principles to pharmaceutical systems.
data.title: PHYSICOCHEMICAL PRINCIPLES OF DRUG FORMULATION AND DELIVERY

data.description: Introductory laboratory course in compounding and dispensing of pharmaceutical dosage forms, including sterile products. Includes practice in interpretation of prescription orders, pharmaceutical calculations, compounding procedures, physical manipulation of drugs and dosage form components, and product packaging and labeling.
data.title: PHARMACEUTICAL CALCULATIONS, DISPENSING AND COMPOUNDING
